page.title: 16Local Authority Services
page.content: Refuse collections are weekly in or near the village; for outlying house- holds, collection is fortnightly, and sometimes the pick-up point is at the road end of a farm lane.Southernmost households are served by N.Devon District Council, the rest by West Somerset Distict Council. Somerset Mobile Library visits the village every third week calling at many farms, but not the most remote ones.Devon Mobile Library calls at Oakford village, not to individual farms. The Local Authority is responsible for Rights of Way, some being over- grown from neglect and lack of use. Others go through W.Nightcott Farm to road from Dulverton to 12 acre Post, Nutsford Bridge to Ashill and Dulv- erton, from East Tapps to Highleigh and Exebridge,a former packhorse track
